description:
You will be in charge of the following :

- Fitness Sales (Meeting and exceeding our sales goal)

- Service (following up with new and prior clients)

- Personal trainers (leading and structuring their daily tasks)

- Member Assesments (Putting new members through workouts)

You must have:

- Sales experience

- Fitness experience

- Workout knowledge

- Customizing work out plans

- Competitive attitude

- High energy

- The ability to influence different dynamics in the workplace

If you meet these requirements we would love to hear from you!

Job Type: Full-time

Pay: $60,000.00 - $80,000.00 per year

Benefits:
• Dental insurance
• Employee discount
• Flexible schedule
• Health insurance
• Paid time off
• Vision insurance

• 8 hour shift
• Monday to Friday
• Weekends as needed

• Customer service: 1 year (Preferred)
• Fitness: 1 year (Preferred)
• Sales: 1 year (Preferred)

License/Certification:
• Drivers license (Preferred)

Work Location: In person
